skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 1 turn if this attack is critical.
Places a 60% [Decrease DEF] and a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns on 1 enemy, then attacks them. Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this champion for 2 turns if this attack kills an enemy.
Attacks 1 enemy. Will heal this Champion equal to any surplus damage if the target is killed.
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff, a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff, a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff, and a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns. [Only Available when Zavia is on the same team]
Increases Ally C. RATE in all Battles by 24%.
